data.name: RPG Maker MV - MT Trees
data.detailed_description:
MT Trees is ideal for those who are looking for unique and fresh sets for their terrain needs, fully compatible with RPG Maker MV/MZ!

Features:

- Several trees of varying sizes and colors
- Bushes, barks, twigs and barren variations included
- Formatted as tilesheets as well as individual files
- Extras tree sets for different plant types!
- Tile size is 48x48, but can fit any engine or grid as preferred

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
